name: Parkour Claus
description:
Have you ever wondered, how would Santa look like while parkouring? Then fear no more. We'd like to present: Parkour Claus. Our team has worked for long, stressful hours to recreate the most realistic experience. This Santa can run, jump, roll, crouch, climb, vault, and even fly! 1 super Santa isn't enough? Then have a dozen! The possibilities are limitless. If you are interested feel free to check out the game on itsch.io. We wish you a successful present collection!

Controls (Gamepad) Left JoystickRunLeft Joystick PressSprintRight JoystickLook AroundYCrouchBRollAUseXJumpStartJoin
